attributes.title: Terrible app for a terrible man
attributes.review: 10/10 would not recommend. Given that the President is an old, fat, orange, racist, misogynist. I don’t see why anyone would think his app would be any better. He’s a billionaire piece of garbage so I hope his app gets taken off the app store he doesn’t deserve anymore money. :)

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: If I could I would rate this app a 0, once I opened the app it started glitching and told me that if I didint support trump that they would kill me and my family, truly scared. Once I deleted the app it told me I need to support and proceeded to tell me they have my location like okay let’s run it up then mr trump. anyways worst app

attributes.title: Literally WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app is scary. Every time I opened it it just played a video of Trump in his underwear singing “I’m a buff baby but I dance like a man” while jiggling his entire body fat. It then asked me to PAY for the “show” he had put on for me. I thought I was downloading an app to follow what our president is doing, not to see his cam girl videos.

attributes.title: Terrible!
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, my phone started to glitch right away. When it finally stopped, and the app started to open, it took an hour for it to load. And then, when it finally did load, it said that I had been hacked!!!!! This is a terrible app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!! From, Karen. Age 43.
